title: Login Problems
body: Hi, im actually mad now, cuz of Login Problem and i dont know whats the Problem????????? can you guys FIX it??????????????????, THANK YOU

replies.body: We've been having some login issues with the EU servers, but I'm starting to see more OCE players reporting this as well. Check out the steps in this [**sticky post**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/uxE7avEp-622-connection-issues-on-eu) and let me know if that's able to help at all.
